御蔭: (おかげ) - grace (of God)/benevolence (of Buddha)/blessing; assistance/help/aid; effects/influence
御蔭で: (おかげで) - thanks to ...; owing to ...; because of ...
御蔭参り: (おかげまいり) - pilgrimage to Ise
御蔭様: (おかげさま) - (somebody's) backing; assistance; thanks to (somebody)
御蔭様で: (おかげさまで) - (I'm fine) thank you; thanks to you; fortunately; under the gods' shadow
御蔵: (オクラ) - shelving (a play, movie, etc.)/closing down/cancelling/canceling/shelf (i.e. "on the shelf"); rice storehouse of the Edo shogunate
御蔵入り: (おくらいり) - being postponed; being shelved; being put on hold
御薦め: (おすすめ) - recommendation; advice; suggestion; encouragement
御薪: (みかまぎ) - kindling burned in shrines and temples; special kindling used in samurai families during the Edo period for the 15th of the first month and painted with 12 brush strokes (13 on a lucky year); kindling offered by officials to the imperial court during the ritsuryo period
御袴料: (おんはかまりょう) - betrothal money given from woman to man
御製: (ぎょせい) - poem or song written by the emperor
御裾分け: (おすそわけ) - sharing with others what has been given to you; sharing a portion of the profit with others
御襁褓気触れ: (おむつかぶれ) - diaper rash; nappy rash
御見外れ: (おみそれ) - failing to recognize someone; underestimation
御見舞: (おみまい) - calling on someone who is ill; enquiry; inquiry
御見舞い: (おみまい) - calling on someone who is ill; enquiry; inquiry
御見逸れ: (おみそれ) - failing to recognize someone; underestimation
御覚えがめでたい: (おおぼえがめでたい) - to stand high in one's superior's favor and trust
御覧: (ごらん) - (after the -te form of a verb)  (please) try to; (please) look; seeing/looking/watching
御覧ください: (ごらんください) - please look at it
御覧なさい: (ごらんなさい) - (please) look; see (used to emphasize that an earlier prediction was correct); (after the -te form of a verb) (please) try to do
御覧なさる: (ごらんなさる) - to see; to look; to watch
御覧になる: (ごらんになる) - to see/to look/to watch; (after the -te form of a verb) try to
御覧に入れる: (ごらんにいれる) - to show; to display
御覧に成る: (ごらんになる) - to see/to look/to watch; (after the -te form of a verb) try to
御覧下さい: (ごらんください) - please look at it
御親切に: (ごしんせつに) - Thank you; How nice of you; That's kind of you
御親拝: (ごしんぱい) - worship by the emperor at a shrine
御触れ: (おふれ) - official notice; (お触れ, 御触れ only)   Edo-period proclamation issued by the shogunate (or a daimyo, etc.) usu. to the general populace
御触書: (おふれがき) - Edo-period proclamation issued by the shogunate (or a daimyo, etc.) usu. to the general populace
御言: (みこと) - the spoken words of the emperor or a noble
御言葉: (みことば) - availing myself of your kind offer/taking you at your word; (みことば only) God's word/word of God
御託: (ごたく) - tedious talk; impertinent talk; repetitious talk; saucy speech; pretentious statement
御詠: (ぎょえい) - poem written by the Emperor or a member of the imperial family
御詠歌: (ごえいか) - pilgrim's song; pilgrim's hymn; song in praise of the Buddha
御詰: (おつめ) - lowest-ranking guest at tea ceremony; tea master
御詰め: (おつめ) - lowest-ranking guest at tea ceremony; tea master
御誂え向き: (おあつらえむき) - perfect; just right; ideal
御誕生会: (おたんじょうかい) - birthday party
御誕生日おめでとうございます: (おたんじょうびおめでとうございます) - Happy Birthday
御調子者: (おちょうしもの) - (yoji) flip; luck-pusher; frivolous person; person who readily chimes in with others; person who gets carried away easily
御談義: (おだんぎ) - lecture (i.e. an admonishment); sermon
御負け: (おまけ) - freebie (e.g. with a purchase)/something additional/bonus/an extra; price reduction/discount; exaggeration
御負けに: (おまけに) - to make matters worse; besides; what's more; in addition; on top of that
御貸人: (ごしにん) - (ant: 留学生) exported teachers during Meiji period
御足: (おあし) - money; coin; dough; moolah; brass
御足労: (ごそくろう) - (polite term for) inviting another to one's home
御身: (おんみ) - (polite term for) the body; you (him)
御輿: (みこし) - (esp. 神輿)  portable shrine (carried in festivals); (みこし only)  (esp. 御輿)  palanquin; (みこし only)  (esp. sitting down, getting up, etc.)  buttocks/lower back/waist/hips
御輿を担ぐ: (みこしをかつぐ) - to wheedle a person into doing something; to carry a portable shrine
御輿を据える: (みこしをすえる) - to ensconce oneself (e.g. in a chair); to settle oneself down; to plant oneself
御辞儀草: (オジギソウ) - mimosa (Mimosa pudica); sensitive plant; touch-me-not
御辺: (おんあたり) - you (usu. used by samurai to their equals or people of slightly higher standing)
御迎え: (おむかえ) - receiving/welcoming/going to meet; final call/call of fate/approach of death
御返し: (おかえし) - return gift/return favour (favor); revenge; change (in a cash transaction)
御通夜: (おつや) - all-night vigil over a body; wake
御連絡: (ごれんらく) - to contact/to get in touch; contacting/getting in touch/communication/(your) call/(your) message
御遊: (ぎょゆう) - music playing in imperial court
御達し: (おたっし) - notice or order handed down from above/announcement/notification; Edo-period proclamation issued by the shogunate (or a daimyo, etc.) to the concerned parties
御遣い: (おつかい) - errand/mission/going as envoy; messenger/bearer/errand boy/errand girl; familiar spirit
御邪魔: (おじゃま) - (suru and itasu verb forms are used as set phrases said prior to entering or leaving someone's home)  hindrance; intrusion
御邪魔します: (おじゃまします) - excuse me for disturbing (interrupting) you; greeting used when entering someone's home
御邪魔虫: (おじゃまむし) - someone who gets in the way without serving any useful purpose; fly in the ointment; buttinsky; third wheel
御都合主義: (ごつごうしゅぎ) - opportunism; double standards; timeserving; expediency
御酌: (おしゃく) - pouring alcohol; person pouring alcohol for guests or customers (typically a woman); (apprentice) geisha/dancing girl
御酒: (みわ) - sacred wine or sake; sake offered to the gods
御釈迦: (おしゃか) - poorly made or ruined articles; the Buddha
御釈迦様の誕生日: (おしゃかさまのたんじょうび) - Buddha's birthday
御里: (おさと) - one's parents' home; one's origins/one's upbringing/one's past
御里が知れる: (おさとがしれる) - to reveal one's upbringing (through one's words, actions, etc.); to betray one's origin; to give oneself away
御釜: (オカマ) - pot; volcanic crater; (one's) buttocks; (often derog.) male homosexual/effeminate man/male transvestite
